mapper.select: select l_no, b_no, g_no from `like` where b_no = #{bNo} and g_no = #{gNo}
mapper.delete: delete from daedong.`like` where b_no = #{bNo} and g_no = #{gNo}
mapper.select: SELECT count(l_no) FROM daedong.`like` l join board b on b.b_no = l.b_no join guest g on b.g_no = g.g_no where l.l_read = 0 and g.g_no=#{gNo}

select l.b_no, l.l_date, b_title, g.g_no, g.g_name, g.g_id FROM daedong.`like` l join board b on b.b_no = l.b_no join guest g on l.g_no = g.g_no where b.g_no=#{gNo} and b.b_delete=0 order by l.l_date desc;
